about_the_game:
Step into the chilling world of Whispering Death, a survival horror game with intricate puzzle elements that will keep you on the edge of your seat. In this game, you play as a man who wakes up in a nightmarish realm, stripped of his memories and haunted by the unknown. Your goal is to remember who you are and find a way out of this terrifying place.

Navigate through a frightful environment teeming with monstrous creatures and sinister entities that thirst for your demise. The game masterfully blends storytelling, and puzzle-solving, ensuring a gripping experience that challenges both your wits and nerves.

Whispering Death stands out with its procedurally generated items, offering players a unique experience each time they play. This feature ensures that no two playthroughs are the same, demanding new strategies and approaches every time you dive into the horror.

Prepare yourself for a survival horror experience like no other, where every corner hides a new threat and every step could be your last.

content_descriptors.notes: The game will feature episodic scenes and references to death and violence.

short_description: Whispering Death is a short horror experience that puts you in a mysterious realm blending in with your past. Solve puzzles and find out who you are. But remember you are always beeing watched, so think through every decission you make before it's too late.
